name: NSFileProviderItemProtocol
desc: A protocol that defines the properties of an item managed by the File Provider extension.

items.name: var itemIdentifier: NSFileProviderItemIdentifier
items.desc: The item’s persistent identifier.

items.name: var filename: String
items.desc: The item’s filename.

items.name: var contentType: UTType
items.desc: The item’s Uniform Type Identifier (UTI).

items.name: var capabilities: NSFileProviderItemCapabilities
items.desc: The item’s capabilities.

items.name: var childItemCount: NSNumber?
items.desc: The number of items contained by this item.

items.name: var documentSize: NSNumber?
items.desc: The document's size, in bytes.

items.name: var parentItemIdentifier: NSFileProviderItemIdentifier
items.desc: The persistent identifier of the item's parent folder.

items.name: var isTrashed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether an item is in the trash.

items.name: var symlinkTargetPath: String?
items.desc: The target of the symlink.

items.name: var contentModificationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date the item was last modified.

items.name: var creationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date the item was created.

items.name: var lastUsedDate: Date?
items.desc: The date the item was last used.

items.name: var itemVersion: NSFileProviderItemVersion
items.desc: A version object that tracks changes to an item.

items.name: var versionIdentifier: Data?
items.desc: A data value used to determine when the item changes.

items.name: var isMostRecentVersionDownloaded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item is the most recent version downloaded from the server.

items.name: var isUploading: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item is currently uploading to your remote server.

items.name: var isUploaded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item has been uploaded to your remote server.

items.name: var uploadingError: Error?
items.desc: An object describing an error that occurred while uploading the item.

items.name: var isDownloading: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item is currently downloading from your remote server.

items.name: var isDownloaded: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item has been downloaded from your remote server.

items.name: var downloadingError: Error?
items.desc: An object describing an error that occurred while downloading the item.

items.name: var isShared: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item is shared with other users.

items.name: var isSharedByCurrentUser: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the item was shared by the current user.

items.name: var mostRecentEditorNameComponents: PersonNameComponents?
items.desc: The most recent editor's name.

items.name: var ownerNameComponents: PersonNameComponents?
items.desc: The name of the item's owner.

items.name: var extendedAttributes: [String : Data]
items.desc: The extended file attributes synced by the File Provider extension.

items.name: var fileSystemFlags: NSFileProviderFileSystemFlags
items.desc: Flags that define an item’s on-disk properties and its appearance in the user interface.

items.name: struct NSFileProviderFileSystemFlags
items.desc: Flags that define an item’s on-disk properties and its appearance in the user interface.

items.name: var tagData: Data?
items.desc: An abstract data blob representing the tags associated with the item.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: A property list that contains additional data about the item.

items.name: var favoriteRank: NSNumber?
items.desc: A 64-bit, unsigned integer indicating the order of the favorite item in the Favorites list.

items.name: let NSFileProviderFavoriteRankUnranked: UInt64
items.desc: A value that indicates that the item is not ranked.

items.name: var typeAndCreator: NSFileProviderTypeAndCreator
items.desc: The file type and creator codes for the item.
